message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Hello Alice, thanks for offering this product.  I'm interested, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider a lower price, perhaps around $80?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not quite ready to sell at $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $100. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
